name: patient_id
description: Unique patient identifier

name: dbs_coverage_effective_date
description: The date from which this policy is effective for services furnished for Deep Brain Stimulation (DBS).

name: dbs_thalamic_VIM_covered
description: Coverage for unilateral or bilateral thalamic ventralis intermedius nucleus (VIM) deep brain stimulation (DBS).

name: dbs_subthalamic_nucleus_STN_covered
description: Coverage for unilateral or bilateral subthalamic nucleus (STN) deep brain stimulation (DBS).

name: dbs_globus_pallidus_interna_GPi_covered
description: Coverage for unilateral or bilateral globus pallidus interna (GPi) deep brain stimulation (DBS).

name: dbs_device_fda_approved_or_ide_protocol
description: DBS devices must be Food and Drug Administration (FDA) approved or used in accordance with FDA approved protocols governing Category B Investigational Device Exemption (IDE) DBS clinical trials.

name: diagnosis_essential_tremor
description: Diagnosis of essential tremor (ET) based on postural or kinetic tremors of hand(s) without other neurologic signs.

name: diagnosis_idiopathic_parkinsons_disease
description: Diagnosis of idiopathic Parkinson's disease (PD) based on the presence of at least 2 cardinal PD features (tremor, rigidity or bradykinesia).

name: parkinsons_disease_minimum_cardinal_features
description: Minimum number of cardinal Parkinson's disease features (tremor, rigidity, or bradykinesia) required for diagnosis.

name: parkinsons_disease_tremor_dominant_form
description: Parkinson's disease must be of a tremor-dominant form (for thalamic VIM DBS consideration).

name: tremor_rating_scale_Fahn_Tolosa_Marin_level
description: Marked disabling tremor of at least level 3 or 4 on the Fahn-Tolosa-Marin Clinical Tremor Rating Scale (or equivalent scale) in the extremity intended for treatment.

name: tremor_causing_significant_limitation_despite_optimal_medical_therapy
description: Tremor causing significant limitation in daily activities despite optimal medical therapy.

name: patient_willingness_cooperation_operative_post_surgical
description: Patient's willingness and ability to cooperate during conscious operative procedure, as well as during post-surgical evaluations, adjustments of medications and stimulator settings.

name: parkinsons_disease_advanced_idiopathic_Hoehn_Yahr_UPDRS_criteria
description: Advanced idiopathic Parkinson's disease as determined by the use of Hoehn and Yahr stage or Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale (UPDRS) part III motor subscale (for STN or GPi DBS consideration).

name: parkinsons_disease_L_dopa_responsive_with_on_periods
description: Patient must be L-dopa responsive with clearly defined 'on' periods (for STN or GPi DBS consideration).

name: parkinsons_disease_persistent_disabling_symptoms_drug_side_effects_despite_therapy
description: Persistent disabling Parkinson's symptoms or drug side effects (e.g., dyskinesias, motor fluctuations, or disabling 'off' periods) despite optimal medical therapy (for STN or GPi DBS consideration).

name: contraindication_non_idiopathic_parkinsons_or_plus_syndromes
description: DBS is not covered for non-idiopathic Parkinson's disease or 'Parkinson's Plus' syndromes.

name: contraindication_cognitive_impairment_dementia_depression
description: DBS is not covered for cognitive impairment, dementia or depression, which would be worsened by or would interfere with the patient's ability to benefit from DBS.

name: contraindication_current_psychosis_alcohol_drug_abuse
description: DBS is not covered for current psychosis, alcohol abuse or other drug abuse.

name: contraindication_structural_lesions_movement_disorder_etiology
description: DBS is not covered for structural lesions such as basal ganglionic stroke, tumor or vascular malformation as etiology of the movement disorder.

name: contraindication_previous_movement_disorder_surgery_affected_basal_ganglion
description: DBS is not covered for previous movement disorder surgery within the affected basal ganglion.

name: contraindication_significant_medical_surgical_neurologic_orthopedic_comorbidities_DBS_contraindicated
description: DBS is not covered for significant medical, surgical, neurologic or orthopedic co-morbidities contraindicating DBS surgery or stimulation.

name: neurosurgeon_properly_trained_DBS
description: Neurosurgeons must be properly trained in the DBS procedure.

name: neurosurgeon_experience_surgical_management_movement_disorders_dbs
description: Neurosurgeons must have experience with the surgical management of movement disorders, including DBS therapy.

name: neurosurgeon_experience_stereotactic_neurosurgical_procedures
description: Neurosurgeons must have experience performing stereotactic neurosurgical procedures.

name: operative_team_dbs_systems_training_experience
description: Operative teams must have training and experience with DBS systems, including knowledge of anatomical and neurophysiological characteristics for localizing the targeted nucleus, surgical and/or implantation techniques for the DBS system, and operational and functional characteristics of the device.

name: movement_disorder_physician_involved_patient_selection_post_procedure_care
description: Physicians specializing in movement disorders must be involved in both patient selection and post-procedure care.

name: hospital_brain_imaging_equipment_stereotactic_localization
description: Hospital medical centers must have brain imaging equipment (MRI and/or CT) for pre-operative stereotactic localization and targeting of the surgical site(s).

name: hospital_operating_rooms_stereotactic_surgery_equipment
description: Hospital medical centers must have operating rooms with all necessary equipment for stereotactic surgery.

name: hospital_support_services_complication_care
description: Hospital medical centers must have support services necessary for care of patients undergoing this procedure and any potential complications arising intraoperatively or postoperatively.
